name: Waffle Simulator
description:
What things would a Waffle want to do, you ask? The options are limitless:

  • A full, 3D world to explore and find hidden secrets throughout.
  • An interesting cast of characters including an evil arch-nemesis waffle, a beautiful bottle of syrup, and a dumb pancake.
  • Collectible sticks of butter scattered throughout the world.
  • Quests to complete for characters.
  • TONS of inventory items that can be picked up and placed into the players' own personal inventory.
  • Hidden achievements for the player to unlock by playing the game and finding secrets. 
  • Realistic physics allowing the player to wreak havoc and make a huge mess.
